features: This tent may not adhere to CPAI-84
Industry leading DAC Featherlight™ NSL poles.
Direct connection point secures tent body, frame and fly at each guy-out point for a solid connection between all three components.
Large dry entry vestibules with a sleeved internal pole on one side provide ample headroom, gear storage.
Snow flaps on front vestibule seal out spindrift.
Waterproof construction with fully taped fly and bathtub floor.
Internal tension shelves provide strength and storage.
Mesh and canopy zippered through-vent allows ventilation and view through the fly window.
Triple reinforced UVX window for a brighter interior and visibility of exterior conditions.
Color coding for easy pole set up.
Gear can be stored off the floor using internal mesh pockets.
